# Assign the App Encryption Declaration for a Build

**Web Service Endpoint**

Assign an app encryption declaration to a build.

## Modifying Builds

- **Modify a Build**: Expire a build or change its encryption exemption setting.

items.description: Expire a build or change its encryption exemption setting.
